item.title: Nested Loops
item.description: Dette er et eksempel på hvordan man bruge indlejrede løkker (løkker inden i andre løkker). function setup() { createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight); } function draw(){ background(0); const gridSize = 35; const focusX = mouseX const focusY = mouseY for (let x = gridSize; x <= width - gridSize; x += gridSize) { for (let y = gridSize; y <= height - gridSize; y += gridSize) { stroke(255, random(40, 100)); strokeWeight(3) point(x, y); stroke(255, 20); strokeWeight(1) line(x, y, focusX, focusY); } } } Demo Prøv det kørende eksempel
